subject: Status report + migration reminder
content: Report: MCP messaging in ybis.py (send/read/ack) is live; msg_tool is deprecated. Cutover plan in docs/specs/MCP_MESSAGING_CUTOVER_PLAN.md and MCP usage in docs/UAP_MIGRATION_GUIDE.md. Viz scaffold in src/dashboard/viz/. Dashboard now reads tasks.db and shows PLAN/RESULT. Risks: MCP GraphDB import coupling and parallel file-based messaging. Action: move all agents to ybis.py message and stop writing Knowledge/Messages/inbox for active comms.
